item.title: Report X-2024041166
item.description:
Report X-2024041166

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-26T15:12:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-11
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING PACKAGE FOUND ON EAST PRIMARY BELT. RESPONDER CALLED. RESPONDER RESPONDED FOLLOWING APPROPRIATE UPS RESPONSE PROTOCOLS. RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGING CONTAINED LEAKING BATTERY, BROUGHT PACKAGE BACK TO PSC. ANOTHER RESPONDER IDENTIFIED PACKAGE AS POSSIBLE UNDECLARED HAZMAT, STARTED UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCESS. NOTICED INTERIOR BOX HAD APPROPRIATE CORROSIVE HAZMAT MARKINGS, WHILE EXTERIOR BOX LACKED THEM.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING CONTENTS WERE DISCOVERED DURING UNLOADING OF PACKAGE. HAZMAT RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO CLEAN UP SPILL RESIDUE AND REMOVE PACKAGE TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON REGULATED PRODUCT LEAKED; NO LEAK TO AEROSOLS.

item.title: Report I-2024040040
item.description:
Report I-2024040040

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-25T15:11:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-18
  • City: GASTON
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: MCMINNVILLE GAS INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: There was no leaking of propane from the delivery bobtail. Delivery truck approached a semi w/ trailer turning left from HWY47 onto Matteson road While going North Two Cars were waiting and the driver of delivery truck Two cars were waiting and the driver of delivery truck had the sun in his eyes and was unable to brake quick enough to time. The front passenger side of the BMW car , this pushed the car into the back of a pickup causing it to flip onto top of the vehicle and hitting the BMW. Meanwhile the delivery driver flipped onto the drivers side, sliding to a stop when hitting the semi's trailer that had been turning onto Matteson Rd. Mcminniville Gas owner and service guy then accessed the delivery truck & found no leaks. They then emptied 1200 gallons out of the truck and the tow company pulled the truck upright.
